001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.util;
002
003import cloud.commandframework.ArgumentDescription;
004import cloud.commandframework.arguments.CommandArgument;
005import cloud.commandframework.arguments.parser.ArgumentParseResult;
006import cloud.commandframework.arguments.parser.ArgumentParser;
007import cloud.commandframework.captions.Caption;
008import cloud.commandframework.captions.CaptionVariable;
009import cloud.commandframework.context.CommandContext;
010import cloud.commandframework.exceptions.parsing.NoInputProvidedException;
011import cloud.commandframework.exceptions.parsing.ParserException;
012import net.kyori.adventure.key.Key;
013import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
014
015import javax.annotation.Nullable;
016
017import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.DemeterPlugin;
018import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.feature.Seasons;
019
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.Queue;
023import java.util.function.BiFunction;
024
025/**
026 * Command argument which parses a {@link Seasons.Season}.
027 * @param <C> The command sender type.
028 */
029public final class SeasonArgument<C> extends CommandArgument<C, Seasons.Season> {
030    /** When a season cannot be parsed. */
031    public static final Caption ARGUMENT_PARSE_FAILURE_SEASON = Caption.of("argument.parse.failure.season");
032
033    private final DemeterPlugin plugin;
034
035    private SeasonArgument(
036            final DemeterPlugin plugin,
037            final boolean required,
038            final @NonNull String name,
039            final @NonNull String defaultValue,
040            final @Nullable BiFunction<@NonNull CommandContext<C>,
041                    @NonNull String, @NonNull List<@NonNull String>> suggestionsProvider,
042            final @NonNull ArgumentDescription defaultDescription
043    ) {
044        super(required, name, new SeasonParser<>(plugin), defaultValue, Seasons.Season.class, suggestionsProvider, defaultDescription);
045        this.plugin = plugin;
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * Create a new builder
050     *
051     * @param plugin Plugin
052     * @param name   Name of the component
053     * @param <C>    Command sender type
054     * @return Created builder
055     */
056    public static <C> @NonNull Builder<C> newBuilder(final DemeterPlugin plugin, final @NonNull String name) {
057        return new Builder<>(plugin, name);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * Create a new required command component
062     *
063     * @param plugin Plugin
064     * @param name   Component name
065     * @param <C>    Command sender type
066     * @return Created component
067     */
068    public static <C> @NonNull CommandArgument<C, Seasons.Season> of(final DemeterPlugin plugin, final @NonNull String name) {
069        return SeasonArgument.<C>newBuilder(plugin, name).asRequired().build();
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Create a new optional command component
074     *
075     * @param plugin Plugin
076     * @param name   Component name
077     * @param <C>    Command sender type
078     * @return Created component
079     */
080    public static <C> @NonNull CommandArgument<C, Seasons.Season> optional(final DemeterPlugin plugin, final @NonNull String name) {
081        return SeasonArgument.<C>newBuilder(plugin, name).asOptional().build();
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Create a new required command component with a default value
086     *
087     * @param plugin       Plugin
088     * @param name         Component name
089     * @param defaultValue Default value
090     * @param <C>          Command sender type
091     * @return Created component
092     */
093    public static <C> @NonNull CommandArgument<C, Seasons.Season> optional(
094            final DemeterPlugin plugin,
095            final @NonNull String name,
096            final @NonNull Key defaultValue
097    ) {
098        return SeasonArgument.<C>newBuilder(plugin, name).asOptionalWithDefault(defaultValue.toString()).build();
099    }
100
101
102    public static final class Builder<C> extends CommandArgument.Builder<C, Seasons.Season> {
103        private final DemeterPlugin plugin;
104
105        private Builder(final DemeterPlugin plugin, final @NonNull String name) {
106            super(Seasons.Season.class, name);
107            this.plugin = plugin;
108        }
109
110        /**
111         * Builder a new example component
112         *
113         * @return Constructed component
114         */
115        @Override
116        public @NonNull SeasonArgument<C> build() {
117            return new SeasonArgument<>(
118                    plugin,
119                    this.isRequired(),
120                    this.getName(),
121                    this.getDefaultValue(),
122                    this.getSuggestionsProvider(),
123                    this.getDefaultDescription()
124            );
125        }
126
127    }
128
129    public static final class SeasonParser<C> implements ArgumentParser<C, Seasons.Season> {
130        private final DemeterPlugin plugin;
131
132        public SeasonParser(DemeterPlugin plugin) {
133            this.plugin = plugin;
134        }
135
136        @Override
137        public @NonNull ArgumentParseResult<Seasons.Season> parse(
138                final @NonNull CommandContext<C> ctx,
139                final @NonNull Queue<@NonNull String> inputQueue
140        ) {
141            //noinspection PatternValidation
142            final String input = inputQueue.peek();
143            if (input == null) {
144                return ArgumentParseResult.failure(new NoInputProvidedException(
145                        Key.class,
146                        ctx
147                ));
148            }
149            inputQueue.remove();
150
151            Seasons.Season season = plugin.seasons().config().seasons.get(input);
152            if (season == null)
153                return ArgumentParseResult.failure(new ParseException(input, ctx));
154            return ArgumentParseResult.success(season);
155        }
156
157        @Override
158        public boolean isContextFree() {
159            return true;
160        }
161
162        @Override
163        public @NonNull List<@NonNull String> suggestions(@NonNull CommandContext<C> ctx, @NonNull String input) {
164            return new ArrayList<>(plugin.seasons().config().seasons.keySet());
165        }
166    }
167
168    public static final class ParseException extends ParserException {
169        public ParseException(String input, CommandContext<?> ctx) {
170            super(Seasons.Season.class, ctx, ARGUMENT_PARSE_FAILURE_SEASON,
171                    CaptionVariable.of("input", input));
172        }
173    }
174}
